entry.title: Hi, I‚Äôm Eric
entry.content:
On this website you will find some more about me, what I have been working on, and tangents on topics that are interesting to me.

I‚Äôve worked at three Fortune 100 Companies in the US and Europe, lived and worked in Germany for 8 months, and recieved a graduate certificate from Harvard Business School. My major was Computer Engineering, and I graduated with minors in Computer Science and Mathematics. In college, I was elected Vice President of my fraternity, skydove from 10,000 feet, and travelled to more than a dozen countries all before my 22nd birthday.

Have questions or comments? I would like to hear from you! Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or send me an email.

Cheers! üçª
Eric
